app.name: PipBox
app.tagline: Người bạn đồng hành năng suất của bạn

onboarding.welcomeMessage: Your minimalist productivity companion for focused work sessions
onboarding.step1Description: Click the timer to set your focus duration. Use presets or enter a custom time.
onboarding.step2Description: Start your session and let the ant guide your progress from start to finish.
onboarding.step3Description: Work in focused 25-minute intervals with 5-minute breaks. Take a longer break after 4 sessions.
onboarding.step4Description: Watch the ant travel across the screen as your session progresses. Stay motivated!
onboarding.step5Description: Get notified when your session completes with sound and system notifications.
onboarding.step6Description: You're all set! Start your first session and boost your productivity.
onboarding.changeAnytime: Bạn có thể thay đổi điều này bất cứ lúc nào trong cài đặt
onboarding.setPresets: Đặt cài đặt sẵn hẹn giờ
onboarding.addFavoriteDurations: Thêm thời lượng tập trung yêu thích
